Posts.Content: kathylyon wrote: hello -  I had a recurrence of breast cancer ( first time 5 years ago) and had a masectomy this time.   ER+/PR+. My  oncologist sent in tissue for oncotype dx and it came back with a score of 23 ( intermediate). She is recommmending chemo and saying it will add 5% on to my chances of not have a recurrence.   I am 55 years old.   Can anyone give their experience with recurrence  and their thoughts on going with chemo and it's side effects when given only 5%?  She said she would give me the Chemo drugs of Taxotere and Cytoxan but not Adriamycin.    Also does anyone know if you lose all of your hair with Taxotere or the hair becomes thinner?  The Oncologist said it would become thinner but I would not lose it.  thanks for you help.                     Log in to post a reply
